article_title: MSNBC Hides Congressional Defeat of Chris Matthews' Wife From Viewers
article_text:

article_metadata.news_keywords: MSNBC, Chris Matthews, Wife, Defeat, Democratic, Primary

og.description: The wife of MSNBC host Chris Matthews suffered a stinging defeat in Maryland's 8th Congressional District Democratic primary - but her loss was never mentioned by the cable news network, the Washington Examiner reports.
